Key.Original:
ULTIMATE SCREENSHOT SIMULATOR

ULTIMATE SCREENSHOT SIMULATOR

Key.Original: Arma 3 is a <t color='%1'>unique military game</t> with an <t color='%1'>infantry focus</t>. Key.English: Arma 3 is a <t color='%1'>unique military game</t> with an <t color='%1'>infantry focus</t>. Built upon <t color='%1'>appropriate</t>, <t color='%1'>useful</t> and <t color='%1'>engaging</t> elements of <t color='%1'>simulation</t>, it's an <t color='%1'>accessible platform</t> for a variety of official and community playable / sandbox content, based on the principles of <t color='%1'>authenticity</t>, <t color='%1'>diversity</t> and <t color='%1'>opportunity</t>.

Key.Original: Experience is a hard teacher because she gives the test first, the lesson afterwards.

Key.Original: We succeed only as we identify in life, or in war, or in anything else, a single overriding objective, and make all other considerations bend to that one objective.

Key.English: We succeed only as we identify in life, or in war, or in anything else, a single overriding objective, and make all other considerations bend to that one objective.

Key.Russian: Це iм'я для змiнної вже використовується!
Йде з'єднання ... очiкую вiдповiдь вiд сервера.

Key.Original: We improve ourselves by victories over ourself. There must be contests, and you must win.

Key.English: We improve ourselves by victories over ourself. There must be contests, and you must win.

Key.Original: War does not determine who is right - only who is left.

Key.Original: Game will launch the Xbox Dashboard to create a new account. Continue?

Key.Original: Wars have never hurt anybody except the people who die.

Key.English: Wars have never hurt anybody except the people who die.

Key.Original: Mankind must put an end to war, or war will put an end to mankind.
Key.Russian: Або людство покiнчить з вiйною, або вiйна покiнчить з людством.

Key.Russian: Я ще й не починав битися!
Key.English: I have not yet begun to fight!

Key.Original: Once the game is over, the king and the pawn go back in the same box.
Key.Russian: Нiщо так не пiднiмає бойовий дух, як мертвий генерал.
Key.English: Once the game is over, the king and the pawn go back in the same box.

Key.Original: A man who won't die for something is not fit to live.

Key.English: A man who won't die for something is not fit to live.

Key.Original: I believe that people would be alive today if there were a death penalty.

Key.English: I believe that people would be alive today if there were a death penalty.

Key.Original: I do not believe in a fate that falls on men however they act; but I do believe in a fate that falls on them unless they act.

Key.English: I do not believe in a fate that falls on men however they act; but I do believe in a fate that falls on them unless they act.

Key.English: A man's dying is more the survivors' affair than his own.

Key.Original: It is hard to have patience with people who say 'There is no death' or 'Death doesn't matter.' There is death and whatever is matters.

Key.English: It is hard to have patience with people who say 'There is no death' or 'Death doesn't matter.' There is death and whatever is matters.

Key.Original: It's not that I'm afraid to die, I just don't want to be there when it happens.

Key.English: It's not that I'm afraid to die, I just don't want to be there when it happens.

Key.Original: Men are at war with each other because each man is at war with himself.

Key.English: Men are at war with each other because each man is at war with himself.

Key.Original: As to you, Life, I reckon you are the leavings of many deaths; No doubt I have died, myself ten thousand times before.
Key.Russian: А ти, Життя, я впевнений, ти - залишки багатьох смертей. (Не сумнiваюся, що ранiше я i сам помирав десять тисяч разiв.)
Key.English: As to you, Life, I reckon you are the leavings of many deaths; No doubt I have died, myself ten thousand times before.

Key.Original: And lastly there is the oldest and deepest desire, the Great Escape: the Escape from Death.

Key.English: And lastly there is the oldest and deepest desire, the Great Escape: the Escape from Death.

Key.Original: Many that live deserve death. And some that die deserve life.
Key.Russian: Багато з живучих заслуговують смертi. А деякi з померлих - життя.
Key.English: Many that live deserve death. And some that die deserve life.

Key.Original: Death is a very dull, dreary affair, and my advice to you is to have nothing whatsoever to do with it.

Key.English: Death is a very dull, dreary affair, and my advice to you is to have nothing whatsoever to do with it.

Key.Original: Stay out of the road, if you want to grow old.

Key.English: Stay out of the road, if you want to grow old.

Key.Original: Night vision goggles are intended for observation and terrain orientation at night. They work by intensifying the already available light in conditions of low illumination using, for instance, light from the moon or the stars.

Key.English: Night vision goggles are intended for observation and terrain orientation at night. They work by intensifying the already available light in conditions of low illumination using, for instance, light from the moon or the stars.

Key.Original: Binoculars allow the soldier to survey the battlefield over long distances.
Key.Russian: За допомогою бiнокля солдат може оглядати поле бою.
Key.English: Binoculars allow the soldier to survey the battlefield over long distances.

Key.English: A time bomb is a generic term for a simple explosive device fitted with a timer. It can be detonated at any given time set by the user.
